Claim: "Many African American children gather in a small classroom where their studies are provided by Unicef."
Referring expressions: Many African American children, small classroom, Unicef.  Many kids, school.
Formula: (exists c (exists a (exists b (IsMany(a) and (IsInSmallClassroom(b) and IsProvidedByUnicef(c)))))) -> (exists e (exists d (IsMany(d) and IsAtSchool(e))))
